data.thought: S10|P|S4|Switching to BRANCH B: Reactive+Container behaviors. Core pattern: notebook responds to external events by spawning containerized processes. Unlike static notebooks (run once) or pure reactive (respond in-process), these spawn isolated execution environments. Key enabler: container-use MCP server. Observable via: Observatory app channel (preview:status, preview:log). High novelty bc combines event-driven + sandboxed execution.
